content: pb & w princess buttercup & westley designed by adrienne fong gauge 8 5 sts & 12 row/inch in stockinette notes when more than one number is given the first applies to the small size the second to the medium the third to the large and the last to the extra-large the size of the sock can be adjusted by using a smaller or larger needle for a different gauge pattern includes 2 versions of sock use westley for a non-lacy look or buttercup for a lacy look abbreviations sl - slip as if to purl unless otherwise noted krl knit right loop insert right needle from front to back into right loop of stitch just below next stitch place it onto left needle and knit it kll - insert left needle from back to front into left loop of stitch two row below last completed stitch knit this stitch through the back loop yo - yarn-over ktlb knit 1 through back loop wyif with yarn in front k2tog/p2tog - knit/purl 2 stitches together ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to purl insert left needle through the front loops of the two slipped stitches and knit them together pm/sm- place/slip marker - work group of stitches between brackets for specified number of times rs/ws - right side/wrong side shown in hiwassee creek dyeworks sassafras black ice westley version instructions size adult small med large extra-large 7 8 9 10 cuff using the german twisted cast-on loosely cast inch ankle on 56 64 72 80 stitches join being careful not to twist your stitches pm to indicate beginning of round materials work chart a until cuff is 1 1/4 inches or desired 100 gm fingering wt sock yarn length chart a is worked 8 8 8 10 times per us size 1 5 needles 2 5mm or size needed to round knit to gauge stitch markers transition to leg k6 7 8 7 p1 8 8 8 10 times tapestry needle pb & w princess buttercup & westley © 2012-2013 adrienne fong all rights reserved http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry page 1 leg work row 1-16 1-20 1-24 1-20 of westley instep work 29 33 37 41 instep stitches in pattern as established pm to indicate end of instep pick up or buttercup chart until leg is desired length ending on and knit same number of stitches along remaining side an odd numbered row k 27 31 35 39 sts pm to of heel knit 9 10 11 12 stitches and pm the indicate start of instep work 29 33 37 41 sts in beginning of the round is now the middle of the heel pattern pm to indicate end of instep gusset decreases westley and buttercup charts are worked 8 8 8 10 round 1 decrease round knit to last 2 stitches times per round before first instep marker k2tog sm work 29 33 37 41 sts in pattern as
